channel.title: While server is on
channel.description: while my server is on, when its running people are in it pking and other stuff. my internet just bombs, the CMD files just goes "playername" disconnected until every1 is offline except me. then i have to restart my computer. it happens about every 20 to 30 mins, sometimes even 5 mins after i run the server. its really annoying not just for me, but for the people that play on my server. so if anyone could help. il appreciate it =)

item.title: While server is on
item.dc:creator: @pbrain31 pbrain31
item.description:
@pbrain31 wrote:

NO its not the firewall he must have auto restart that doesnt restart…

lol i didnt get what i said

he must have auto restart that doesnt restart...
LOL wtf? any way you must have an Autokill thing :/
